body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Deck Editor.
2. Load any existing dec file.
3. Card Statistics not updated. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Card Statistics should be updated to reflect loaded deck. Please use labels and text to provide additional information.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Deck statistics not updated when loading an existing deck in Deck Editor
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on December 03, 2013 23:30:10_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Open Deck Editor.
2. Load any existing dec file.
3. Card Statistics not updated. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Card Statistics should be updated to reflect loaded deck. Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=430_
